Hi Lilly,

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.

Here is the link: http://advocateindustrial.com/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

full_threads.body: @heath advocateindustrial is not yet added to Harvest, should I add it?

@heath done in the following updates
- footer details update
- update logo
- update add to cart button styles
- update project site button in above projects row

time: 20mins

action.text: Jaime Velasquez assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Afternoon Heath,

Thankyou!

Looks like Stripe is sorted 😊
In terms of integrating Xero with the website, we have decided to leave this for now until we get transactions actually coming through the site.
HubSpot is now up and running as of today! So let us know what details you need to get that connected.
With the web domain names, we have decided to change the ecommerce website from advocatefireprotection.com <http://advocatefireprotection.com/> to advocatesupply.com.au <http://advocatesupply.com.au/>, and leave the contracting site, advocateindustrial.com <http://advocateindustrial.com/>, as it is for now. Hope that makes sense. LMK if you need any other info.

I have made a list of a few other changes we would like made:
The email address displaying at the bottom of the AFP site will need to change to sales@advocatesupply.com.au <mailto:sales@advocatesupply.com.au> and the phone number changed to 1300 309 770
We would like “projects site” button on the projects page to appear above the row of projects (pictured attached)
We will need to change the logo on the AFP to the advocate supply logo, I have attached. LMK if you need any other sizes/formats.
As discussed yesterday, we will need the “add to cart” text on each product showing as a button.

Let us know if you have any questions. Thankyou! 😊


Kind Regards,

Lilly Bulloch / Admin & Marketing
Advocate Industrial

Mob: 0466821021
Email: lilly@advocateindustrial.com <mailto:lilly@advocateindustrial.com>
Projects: www.advocateindustrial.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3A__www.advocateindustrial.com_&d=DwMFAg&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=PIK4VsrWco8yb46AtgG8RqBWSBmWyklHg0Z_kTa-e_w&m=7n-V-4fggBr_VF-7wXsN8j4ntu_mI4D7XIS6NQmj_Gs&s=jtn_6Lu6t4-qOTBWA2uM9fC0Pm00IHbh0f3HpejuxCw&e=>
Products: www.advocatefireprotection.com <http://www.advocatefireprotection.com/>

ABN 92 628 805 247



From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 21 July 2021 8:10 PM
To: Lilly Bulloch <lilly@advocateindustrial.com>
Cc: Rena How <renahow01@gmail.com>
Subject: Re: AI Website Work

Hi Lilly and Rena,

Great to chat today! To recap the outcomes and next steps:

We will use Stripe to take the payments on the site. Please setup and account at https://stripe.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__stripe.com&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=fGTAfpR71bxnusRj7RQJ6H-jTtJCDsoFaHR2nq19B3A&s=kBbyM8hPcSPvXrXRsCb5VhHXhzqU8vv2oUw4DDnIB5s&e=> and add heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> as a developer team member: here’s a quick video how to do this: https://www.loom.com/share/73502f870f8d4a32b6557deec8e843f9 <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.loom.com_share_73502f870f8d4a32b6557deec8e843f9&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=fGTAfpR71bxnusRj7RQJ6H-jTtJCDsoFaHR2nq19B3A&s=TcD5Atdw_MQ_-UwdGlFf3uW1fiA5ElB7_q2UgOiYGkk&e=>
To integrate Xero with the website, you will need to get a licence for the Zapier plugin here: https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-zapier/ <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__woocommerce.com_products_woocommerce-2Dzapier_&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=fGTAfpR71bxnusRj7RQJ6H-jTtJCDsoFaHR2nq19B3A&s=OILxv8I3y5Jtss_kk6ys99m2JoO-b90xT-KbnT2wK4k&e=>
Once you have purchased, please download and email me the file
You will also need to setup an account with Zapier here: https://zapier.com/pricing <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__zapier.com_pricing&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=fGTAfpR71bxnusRj7RQJ6H-jTtJCDsoFaHR2nq19B3A&s=vN3usD-ITZs1J276CbPGvtkJUUOUNDt1X7DL5DKd4DM&e=> you will need the ’Starter’ plan to integrate with Xero. Again, please add heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> as a user on your account.
Once HubSpot is back in action I will connect this up with your site for newsletters and also to the Shop to send the details or your customers over as well.

I will wait to here back from you with:

Any other changes you would like on the site
Your decision regarding the domain names etc.

In the meantime, if there is anything else you need an hand with, please shout out.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__wolfiq.com.au_&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=fGTAfpR71bxnusRj7RQJ6H-jTtJCDsoFaHR2nq19B3A&s=eyA79jj6Xxrv6pLMyW-rDm8SLMrlsCZ3USCWtGX0jGc&e=>


On 20 Jul 2021, at 12:01 pm, Lilly Bulloch <lilly@advocateindustrial.com <mailto:lilly@advocateindustrial.com>> wrote:

Hello Heath 😊

Sounds good, thank you! I have booked in for us to call at 1:30pm tomorrow, if that would work with you?

Thanks!

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Friday, 16 July 2021 4:22 PM
To: Roger Bulloch <sales@advocateindustrial.com <mailto:sales@advocateindustrial.com>>
Cc: Lilly Bulloch <lilly@advocateindustrial.com <mailto:lilly@advocateindustrial.com>>
Subject: Re: AI Website Work

Awesome thanks for the below Rena and nice to meet you Lilly.

I have responded to your queries below to keep it all lined up. Items 1, 2 and 4 (PayPal removal) are done as they were quick.

I have made some notes about the other items below. Perhaps we can have a quick call next week to run through them as I will need your input. It’s all very doable, just want to show you the options. Please book in a time to chat with me here:
https://calendly.com/heathmaguire/30min <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__calendly.com_heathmaguire_30min&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=DDP4oDdXPprMRsyq3ZiDceTOyaesN8IgbDNuC-bVlDo&s=pqHceHoY29oe1npnfjgw5qem6s4Le-sVbE7JIr8XVqM&e=>

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__wolfiq.com.au_&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=DDP4oDdXPprMRsyq3ZiDceTOyaesN8IgbDNuC-bVlDo&s=dDrMeqEX1_0B8ZEC-ZoUOvZjrjqsAlwABwg2XCj1Dhg&e=>



On 15 Jul 2021, at 3:58 pm, Roger Bulloch <sales@advocateindustrial.com <mailto:sales@advocateindustrial.com>> wrote:

Afternoon Heath,

Below is a list of changes which we need to make to the website.

I have cc'd in my sister Lilly in who has been looking after the website until now. If you'd like to book a call to discuss, let us know.
1. Fix the Buy now button - Seems to be directed to the developer's website.
*Done


2. Add freight charge at checkout - flat rate of $20 for every order
*Done



3. Integrate to Xero. Is there a way to link invoicing into our Xero Accounts file? Sales need to go to account 'Website sales' (#201)
4. Fix Payment Gateway. Maybe remove PayPal for now as we are having issues with the PayPal account verification. Also, the Card facility doesn't seem to be working on the checkout page. Could you please look at this?
*Need to setup a payment gateway we recommend Stripe - https://stripe.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__stripe.com&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=DDP4oDdXPprMRsyq3ZiDceTOyaesN8IgbDNuC-bVlDo&s=RShahy_Nh4ti-O62QyE6m_Aq5I8CKzVEmtZIro1UIbM&e=>


5. Sign up email address submission form. There is one but doesn't seem to be working.
*Looks like you may be using MailChimp? Please provide your logins and we will hook it up


6. Mobile View – the website displays different on a mobile and we can’t seem to find where to fix this (as in it doesn’t seem to sync with any changes we make to the appearance)
*We can chat about this one, but, please start my clearing the cache on your phone. Sounds like that may be the cause.


Also, going forward (just so you are in the loop) we would like to do the following:
1. Automatic feedback email when a customer places an order.
*We have a whole platform for this : ) We can chat.



2. We also have this website <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__www.advocateindustrial.com_&d=DwMFaQ&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=Zp_KwPlQuG-942Rb1DYhmh6_hexAAo4ovK7UzbuYATg&m=DDP4oDdXPprMRsyq3ZiDceTOyaesN8IgbDNuC-bVlDo&s=pGhek1SVlH0TnLO2DHpUkr-imsPBgET13SJRdi1qt2c&e=> which is for the contract side of our business. We would like to combine the two at some stage. Will need to somehow make it obvious that we sell the goods as well as do the work!
*Noted



Let us know if you have any questions. Thankyou! 😊
Kind Regards,

Rena Bulloch / Admin and Marketing
Advocate Fire Protection

Mob: 0428 977 920
Projects: www.advocateindustrial.com <https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3A__www.advocateindustrial.com_&d=DwMFAg&c=euGZstcaTDllvimEN8b7jXrwqOf-v5A_CdpgnVfiiMM&r=PIK4VsrWco8yb46AtgG8RqBWSBmWyklHg0Z_kTa-e_w&m=7n-V-4fggBr_VF-7wXsN8j4ntu_mI4D7XIS6NQmj_Gs&s=jtn_6Lu6t4-qOTBWA2uM9fC0Pm00IHbh0f3HpejuxCw&e=>
